title: Where can I take my Unity Certification exam?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am interested in becoming a Unity Certified Developer
  • I wish to know where I can take my Certification exam

sections.title: Cause
content: To become Certified, you must pass the Certification Exam with a score of 70% or more.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can sign up to take your Exam at one of our Unity events. Please see this page for locations and dates.

sections.title: More Information
content: To get an idea of what the Certification Exam involves, please see the Certification Exam Objectives here.
For information about Exam costs, please see this article.
